1.1.1.name: wordpress/rk-hreview-for-wp
1.1.1.description:
As you will probably know Google is a crowded place serving up search results that Google feels are relevant your query. With hReview for WordPress you can stand out from the crowd in Google search results by making your product or service review show in listings with review stars, price ranges and a reviewer.

Support | Change Log | FAQ

Features included:

  • Add stars to your Google listing
  • Add pricing information to your Google listing (all currencies supported)
  • Add details of a reviewer to your Google listing
  • If you have your Google+ authorship verified you can show your image next to your review in Google
  • The pottential to increase traffic and conversions!
